EmailTemplate.name: ENSI Program Confirmation to Presenter
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Job__c.Venue_City__c} {!Job__c.Open_course_program_name__c}, {!Job__c.Certificate_Date_Text__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
CC Ian
Hi {!Job__c.Facilitator_1__c}
I can now confirm that the {!Job__c.Venue_City__c}, Module XX Open Course on {!Job__c.Certificate_Date_Text__c} is going ahead. The program will take place at {!Job__c.Venue_Name__c}, located at {!Job__c.Venue_Address__c}. If you need early access, please let me know so that I can arrange it with the venue.
Iâ€™ll be forwarding the participant list shortly.
The PFQ has been sent to the pax (due on {!Job__c.PFQ_Due_Date__c}), and you will receive the presenter information on DATE.
Kind regards
